headline: Amer Sports, Inc. (AS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Amer Sports, Inc. on M Squared Capital’s Substack by Matthew McClintock. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AS. Amer Sports, Inc. ‘s share was trading at $37.09 as of September 16th. AS’s trailing and forward P/E were 90.83 and 32.57 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Amer […]

headline: Lululemon’s Unusual Options Activity: 3 Safer Plays to Consider
summary: Lululemon’s unusual options activity in September has been busy as investors look to profit from the stock’s increased volatility. Down 56% in 2025, LULU hasn’t traded this low since March 2020. Here are three ways to play LULU’s unusual options activity.

headline: BofA Cuts Lululemon (LULU) PT to $185 on Slower China Growth, Reduced Full-Year Revenue Guidance
summary: Lululemon Athletica Inc. (NASDAQ:LULU) is one of the best Canadian stocks to buy now. On September 12, BofA analyst Lorraine Hutchinson lowered the firm’s price target on Lululemon to $185 from $210, while keeping a Neutral rating on the shares to reflect slower China growth and better tariff mitigation. While BofA is raising its FY2026 […]
